name: Treasure and Bones
description:
Unfortunately I wasn't able to get the WebGL version working. This is a relatively short prototype; roughly 3-5 minutes long without sound.

Goal

Can you get to the treasure without losing too many members of the Bones family?

Controls

ActionKeyMenuEscapeMoveWASDJumpSpaceRestart/ReloadR

Assets/Tools Used

Synty Polygon PiratesCurvy SplinesMixamo for AnimationsUnity 2022
